title: Patty's Charcoal Drive-in - description of moon

content.question: In line 36, the description of the moon helps to do which of the following?

choices.label: Emphasize the speaker’s sense of foreboding
Link the changeable nature of the moon to that of the speaker
Cause the speaker to assess how her present position is relevant to her goal of becoming a writer
Show how the speaker’s current situation influences her perception of her environment

content.answer: Show how the speaker’s current situation influences her perception of her environment

skill.text: Skill 6.A: Identify and explain the function of a simile.
